        Parameters:

      • compareSkipSpaces

        public static int compareSkipSpaces(java.lang.String first,
                                    java.lang.String second)
        Compare two string, skipping all white spaces.
        Parameters:
        first - first string to be compared
        second - second string to be compared
        Returns:
        if first string is smaller second string, return -1, if first string is larger than second string, return 1, otherwise return 0.
